sentences.en: All 300 elegantly furnished rooms have private bath.
sentences.cn: 300个布置讲究的房间全都配有独立浴室。

sentences.en: All the rooms were comfortably furnished.
sentences.cn: 所有的房间都配置了舒适的家具。

sentences.en: Eleanor moved into a small furnished apartment.
sentences.cn: 埃莉诺搬进了一间配有家具的小公寓里。

sentences.en: His office is furnished with a desk and four chairs.
sentences.cn: 他的办公室里摆有一张桌子和四把椅子.

sentences.en: The bathroom is furnished with 2 toilets, 2 showers, and 2 sinks.
sentences.cn: 卫生间里装了两个抽水马桶、两个淋浴器、和两个洗脸盆。

sentences.en: The dining-room is luxuriously furnished and carpeted.
sentences.cn: 饭厅装修豪华，地上铺有地毯。

sentences.en: The interior of the house was furnished with heavy, old-fashioned pieces.
sentences.cn: 房子里摆放着笨重的旧式家具。

sentences.en: The living room is furnished simply with wicker furniture.
sentences.cn: 客厅里简单地摆放着几件柳编家具。

sentences.en: The rectory has been sensitively restored and tastefully furnished.
sentences.cn: 教区长的故居已被精心修复，里面的陈设也颇为雅致。

sentences.en: The room was furnished with antiques.
There are 76 individually furnished bedrooms, all with private bathrooms.
sentences.cn: 这里有76间陈设各异的卧室，都配有独立卫生间。

sentences.en: We drank tea by lamplight in his sparsely furnished house.
sentences.cn: 我们在他这间没什么家具的房子里，我们在灯下喝茶。

sentences.en: We took tea by lamplight in his sparsely furnished house.
sentences.cn: 在他那所少有陈设的房子里，我们坐在灯下喝着茶。

phrases.tran_cn: （房间）布置得好；（家俱）陈设得当的

trans.tran_en: A furnished room or house is available to be rented together with the furniture in it

trans.tran_cn: 陈设，布置( furnish的过去式和过去分词)，提供，装备
